  • Our Mission

    Mission

    We aim to inspire and educate while providing an enjoyable and non-judgemental shopping experience. We are a more than profit company who is dedicated to giving back to our local community and local charities.

    Vision

    We want to make zero waste shopping easy and affordable with sustainable choices the most convenient choice. We supply high quality reusable and sustainable products along with refillable products from suppliers who share the same values as we do.

    We may be small fish in the big pond of sustainability, however together with all of the other independent zero waste shops we are making a big difference.

    Core Values

    As a business, we value sustainability, inclusivity, positivity, and passion. These principles drive our commitment to responsible decision-making, a diverse workplace, exceptional products and services, and a passion for excellence..

  • Meet the Founder

    Hi everyone, I am Jillian and this is Lady. I own and run The little Green Larder, Dundee's first fully sustainable shop. I have always been conscious of the environmental impact we are having on our planet, and sustainable living is so important to me. I tried to shop as low-waste as possible, however I struggled to find anywhere that sold a few select items plastic-free. I got tired of waiting for a sustainable shop to open, and after some soul-searching I realised I could open one myself, and so the dream of The Little Green Larder was born. Now my dream is a reality and our staff are all here to help you make easy and affordable switches in order to live a greener life.

    Why not watch my recent Pecha Kucha talk where I talk about my journey opening The Little Green Larder and how to live a sustainable life.
